author: chfast

author: joshuaisbuilding
content:
This opcodes reference actually isn't up to date (see wolflo's comment here: https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website/issues/3900#issuecomment-919589122).

The ethereum.org team are working on adding a canonical opcodes reference to the developer docs. If anyone has the time we could use some help reviewing this PR incase we're missing anything: https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website/pull/4170

author: lightclient
content: <@!643099918998831144>  the reference is up to date, it just doesn't describe in detail the semantics of `JUMP`, `JUMPI` and`JUMPDEST`

author: joshuaisbuilding
content: Ah you're right. My mistake I misremembered. Thanks for checking out the PR üëç
